This is a rendering of hmtl files from the course repository  (https://github.com/jeffreyblanchard/RGenome2021) for Human Genome Analysis taught at the University of Massachusetts Amherst in Spring 2021 by Prof. Jeffrey Blanchard.

## Labs

* Lab 1 : [Introduction to R and Reproducible Research](HumGen_Lab1_intro.html)
* Lab 2 : [Data wrangling 23andMe with the tidyverse](HumGen_Lab2_datawrangle.html)
* Lab 3 : [Graphing with the ggplot](HumGen_Lab3_datavis.html)
* Lab 4 : [Data wrangling and graphing COVID-19 reporting data (Part 1)](HumGen_Lab4_datavis.html)
* Lab 5 : [Publication Graphics](HumGen_Lab5_pub_graphics.html)
* Lab 6 : [Data wrangling, graphing and animating the COVID-19 reporting data](HumGen_Lab6_datavis.html)
* Lab 7 : [Maps](HumGen_Lab7_maps.html)
